website_summaries.verdict: A good bike trailer stroller combo that's difficult to assemble, but once you get it up and rolling, it performs well.
pros: Rolls nicely as a trailer and is easy to push as a stroller, with ample room for two kids
Decent trailer with good suspension and maneuverability
cons: Muddled manual and inconsistent manufacturing frustrate many
Tough to break down and store

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: We don't have bikes yet so we wanted a trailer that could double up as a stroller for now. This thing is amazing. We love it! It easily fits my tall 5 1/2 yr old and my 2yr old. We live in Oregon so it rains a lot. The clear cover that goes up over the top to keep the kids dry is perfect. When it's nice out, we keep the plastic part rolled up and only the mesh one covering them. So glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable Quality For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I have used everyday since purchase and we absolutely LOVE IT!!!!! The quality for this price is unbeatable. We ride 3-8 miles a day I have a 2 year old and a 7 year old my 7 year old is tall so his head is right at the top but they fit together. It only takes a few minutes to transition the bike trailer to a stroller which makes running into stores stress free. This trailer has truly exceeded our expectations. I highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Blak

customer_reviews.title: very picky parents and grand parents
customer_reviews.text: i looked for features first. we will have this many years and I'm not going to skimp because of price. This trailer featured shock absorbing, able to convert to stroller, large pneumonic tires, sturdy, well constructed as to durability and the ability to break it down for storage and travel. We plan to run around Washington, DC with a 9 month old. Well, this trailer met all those requirement and the price was perfect. Not a $400+ trailer but only <$150 so grandparents and parents are very, very happy. (first time for parents and grandparents, so we were all very picky)
customer_reviews.author: David Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Ball bearings fell out can no longer use. Lasted on 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this trailer and used it almost every day to drop my kids off at school. I invested in some nice tires to go with it. Couple days ago i noticed the wheel was all wobbly so i took it off and noticed all the ball bearings fell out. I contacted customer service and they said it they cant replace the bearings. Its sad that such a small part would ruin the whole trailer. I can no longer use the trailer even though a 10 dollar part would fix and make whole again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: This jogger/trailer rocked at Burning Man!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give a high enough review for this stroller jogger. Pushing it was so effortless, even with 70lbs of kids inside. The shocks were an added bonus. The only time I had trouble was when I had 40lbs of ice + the 2 kids. Then it was a little hard to push. My only complaints... 1) The instructions were not very good, especially when hooking up the trailer to bike, 2) the front wheel was kind of hard to remove because the screws were so long. 3) the front wheel was hard to keep in the "free spin" position... the little pin for allowing/disallowing this would not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This trailer does its job. I like that is is multi purpose and converts from a stroller to a trailer. I like the color although the white got dirty fast. This trailer fits larger kids nicely. My 3-4 year old fits great. My daughter is one and slides down. The harness does not hold her in well at all. A pain to assemble and get ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a must-have for people who like to ride bikes and walk, but have multiple children, especially if they're large children. My 25lb and 40lb kids sit in this comfortably for hours. Lots of storage space, pad under seat, the bench is on a higher level than the footrest area, so the kids are comfy. Easy to convert from jogger to bike trailer, you can lock the front wheel, and adjust the handle bar to various heights (great feature for tall people like me)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company
customer_reviews.text: Pulling behind the bike it road pretty smooth. Our little guy loved sitting inside and even fell asleep. Now the tire used for the stroller popped after filling it up to the correct pressure so we haven’t tried the stroller. Reached out to to the manufacturer and they were able to quickly get it taken care of. We bought it because of the price and it’s worth every bit of what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hudgens

customer_reviews.title: Get something else.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a beat up box. One of the side rails for the wheel was dented. One of the wheels had a hole in the rubber tube. Took off the tire and noticed the rim was bent in so many places. Obviously either shipping damaged the thing or there is just absolute horrendous quality control. Brake cables needed adjustment. Instructions were written so small and non instructional.
customer_reviews.author: XP

customer_reviews.title: Seller was great to work with!
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with the threads being stripped inside where one of the screws goes on the braking system. I emailed them about it. They were very responsive and corrected the problem immediately. We have used it separately as a stroller and attached it to the back of the bike as a trailer. It is sturdy, and folds up easily when we aren't using it. I would definitely recommend this product, and would buy it again if we ever need another one!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money. A little too wide.
customer_reviews.text: All in all, a good bike trailer. Seems well built and sturdy. Took my daughter around for a few miles and it held up nicely. She is only 1 1/2 years old but it could have handled a couple of larger kids easy. Used it as a carrier as well for some long family walks, which is a nice option. Don't attach the bumpers if you wish to actually make it through doors. Minus 1 star because the placement of the holder for the front wheel while not in use is asinine. Unusable because it requires the back canvas to be removed in order to place on it.
customer_reviews.author: LiCKQuiD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike trailer for price, but like other reviewers stated, instructions are TERRIBLE! But I am pretty good at putting things together so, it was not bad for me, but I can totally understand why others would be frustrated. Trailer comes with flashlight & rear light (w/batts too) but they are def cheap & nothing that will last. Overall trailer is a great, entry level trailer, for dads/moms who just want to get their kids out w/out spending hundreds. Like it so far!! (2rides)
customer_reviews.author: dre (NJ)

customer_reviews.title: Love Love This Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller, I get so many compliments when I use it. First it is really smooth, there is a lot of room for two kids plus storage is large enough to fit two large bags. The best part of this stroller is that the front wheel is compact so when your in crowds there is no bumping legs, and the bike arm is stored underneath, very handy! The material is good quality and velcro is strong. This is real value for money. Customer Service is AMAZING! we had an issue with the stroller wheel it was bulging in one spot, I took some pictures and the replacement wheel was delivered by the end of the week. So happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: D & A

customer_reviews.title: Smooth comfortable ride for 3 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike trailer!! My 3 year old daughter & our small terrier pup love riding in it. It's a smooth ride and feels weightless to pull. I haven't used it as a jogger so I can't comment on that part but the handle is pretty wobbly so I might see that as an issue. The brakes work great. I did have to take the tire shields off to fit it through the door way (standard size residential front door). I highly recommend it. I also haven't folded it down to transport to the park bike path so I'm not sure how easy or portable it is. But for the smooth ride and effortless pull it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little cart
customer_reviews.text: Pretty smart design, no tools needed to take it down, and that includes the removal of the wheels. My son seems comfortable in it, there's a foot well and seat padding, as well as some basic shocks to dampen bumps. Storage area is enough to hold a breakdown kit and a day pack or two with snacks and hydration. I'll update at the end of season on how it's held up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tesauro

customer_reviews.title: Used trailer, paid for a new one. Halfway assembled, comes with free fruit loops in the seat.
customer_reviews.text: Currently unpacking it. Halfway assembled, clearly used, no instructions. Going to attempt to soldier through with a youtube video but this really sucks. Thanks for the pain in the bum. Update. It's nice. We really like it. But getting something used that we paid a new price for, the 1 star remains. Shady.
customer_reviews.author: quizwhiz

customer_reviews.title: Shady durability and No customer Support
customer_reviews.text: After a year and half of hardly using it, the handle broke off during normal use, makeing this stroller completely useless. Contacted customer support and they were unwilling to provide any support whatsoever since it had been beyond a year after purchasing. Their solution was "place a new order". Do not purchase, even though it's a bargain you should expect greater durability and support.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: I like the potential of this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I like the potential of this stroller. We haven't used it as a trailer yet. The brakes don't work at all which is frustrating. The storage compartment in the back is wonderful as well as the roominess of the cabin. My kids enjoy going on long walks, but my youngest always slides down. We left off the fenders and are able to fit through most doors. Folding this stroller isn't too bad; however, it's not as compact as I would prefer. I probably would have gone with a different one in hindsight.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Worst Customer Service and Assembly Instructions
customer_reviews.text: The ad says it folds flat for car storage. It wasn't evident how I could do that after several attempts, so I contacted the company. They sent me the assembly instructions. When I pointed out that this doesn't reference how to fold it as promised, he said' Sorry, that's all I have. Those assembly instructions, by the way, are horrid. It appears to have missed about 5 steps in the process - we figured it out but not easily! Despite having spent all the time to assemble it, pump up the tires and coordinate with customer service, I'm returning this monster.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great - holds two kids easily
customer_reviews.text: We love this!! Great for my 4 and 2 year old. We used it for the bike and also as a double stroller for the kids. Lots of storage even with the kids in it. We had a quality issue with the front wheel. I wrote a not to the seller and we received a new front wheel assembly as I requested in about 2 weeks. Happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Leidig

customer_reviews.title: Great maneuverability
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bike trailer. The instructions left a little bit to be desired, but it is put together now and looks great. I was worried when my husband mistook the box that arrived for trash, (it was that damaged and ripped open) but the product was wrapped pretty well and there were only a couple minor scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Jgruss

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! It pushes very smoothly and the weather protection is the perfect built in feature. Assembly took me an hour total and the instructions were extremely vague. The most troublesome was the front wheel but once I figured out what plastic piece held it in place I was fine. I love the hidden storage. And pushing with one hand is a breeze. It is quite wide and does not fit through normal doorways or grocery lines so keep that in mind. It is also difficult to fold up and carry up the stairs to our upper split level but it’s doable for the ease of use compared to the standard stroller we were using.
customer_reviews.author: Kora Macias

customer_reviews.title: All Good all around!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Product, very strong and sturdy material, inner lining gets a bit hot when out on the sun, but other than that is all good all around. Very happy with the company, wheels are great for all terrain outdoors, easy to maneuver and transport, fits to my trunk in 2012 Nissan Altima. Bike latch is very easy to use attachment included in the box. The breaks and break system is a bit loose, but I'm not concerned about it. If needed you can easily adjust the break cable to your firmness. Thank you seller, and Thank you Amazon for this Amazing and Awesomely Priced Aosom Trailer Elite III. Loved It, we used all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty good. Few small complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's good, I like the combi stroller/bike trailer. There's some slop in the trailer hitch where it connects to the mainframe that allows the trailer to wander side to side going down the road. And on mine, the front swivel wheel (in stroller mode) is a little sticky swiveling side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie

customer_reviews.title: I liked the harnest and the lap belt.
customer_reviews.text: I took it out for the first time, I have nothing really to compare it to, never used one but the experience was great my 15 month old baby loved it. I felt he was secure in the harnest. I have it four stars bc I wish the arm that connects the trailer to the bike was a bit longer. Other than that. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rena Liufau

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this trailer
customer_reviews.text: This trailer fits my 2yr old twins comfortably. I found it easy to assemble. I use it as a stroller for now but it feels solid enough for biking as well. It's super comfortable to jog with, barely needs pushing. The brakes work well once you adjust them by twisting the bolts. The wheels even have shocks so it's not a bumpy ride.
customer_reviews.author: Alkas

customer_reviews.title: Crooked and busted front tire
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were really excited about this stroller and were looking forward to using it for our 2 and 4 year old girls on our vacation. It is sturdy, well made, not cheap and roomy, handles well, even with the girls in it! Easy to switch from bike trailer to stroller. However, we were highly disappointed after bringing it with us, to notice that the front tire was welded crooked and also busted. I would really like some customer service to replace the front tire and welded piece, then I think we would give it 5 stars. If you don't get a lemon like we did, I think this would be well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M

customer_reviews.title: Wheel issue.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased mid May 2019. Overall, it's been a great buy. I'm writing this today because one of the wheels started begin to wobble. I looked today and noticed that the part of the inner wheel has come apart. I've only had this out with the kids around 25 times and have been low intensity rides. I'm hoping the company will cover the wheel under the warranty. Other than that, we have been satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F

customer_reviews.title: Easy to convert-highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Do the YouTube tutorial for set up, the paper directions are not great. Way better than buying a double stroller! Jogger wheels for trails and my boys are cozy and covered from the WA rain. Highly recommend. Converting to the bike trailer is also really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this. Bought it for a New York trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely recommend this. Bought it for a New York trip ( for my 5 and 8 year old) and it was a life safer!! We took the bus and were able to store it underneath putting it sideways. It won't fit through the house door though. It's very wide, when it's all set up.You have to take the bars, one brake and one wheel off. The instructions that it comes with are not very helpful at all. I had to look up videos on you tube, but it worked out. I like that you are able to adjust the handle up and down.Seat has a cushion which makes it very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbidibob

customer_reviews.title: Bike trailer
customer_reviews.text: I use this trailer for my two Frenchies. Love the multipurpose function as a bike trailer, stroller and jogger. Pretty good value—cost, function and quality. Parts of the instructions were a little challenging but I managed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike trailer! Like others have mentioned, some of the directions are not written very clearly, but it’s not too hard to figure out, heck this girl did it all by herself. The material is good quality and hasn’t ripped even after riding with my yappy dog scratching at the screen the whole time. My baby’s car seat and base fits perfectly and I strap it in with a tie down, and he loves going on rides!
customer_reviews.author: Karli Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Great Features
customer_reviews.text: Putting this thing together takes a little bit of patience as the instructions are a little vague, but it is pretty simple and should only take about 10-15 minutes. The interior is very spacious for my 2 girls. I love the padded cushion, floor well, and 5 point safety harness features inside the cabin. There is a large storage space in the back which is perfect for my diaper bag. It has a smooth ride and my girls looked very secure as we biked along. You do have to inflate the tires, and you have to take it apart slightly in order to fold it for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ninjo!

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves riding in it
customer_reviews.text: Kid (just under 2 years) loves it. Good ventilation and overall design. I'm not using the "wheel bumper" bars as they were bigger than my door's opening. I was skeptical to buy when I saw reviews about the harnesses. If you have a child that won't sit still and tries to get out, they can. My son hasn't had any problems. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: meadd

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The trailer is great for the price! It is not the best quality overall, but it is functional and works great for me. Two main flaws: Don’t rely on its brakes if used as a jogging stroller, they are barely useable. And second, it does not fold or break down easily, so not really suitable for taking it in your car. Mine just stays up in our garage, always. Overall we are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jdt1134

customer_reviews.title: Was a little bit tough to assemble. Lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little bit tough to assemble. Lots of bolts in tight spots. Also, the front wheel is supposed to be straight when it's locked in place and the one I received is slightly off to the right about 5 degrees which makes it rather difficult to push in a straight line in stroller mode without constantly having to lift the front wheel up to correct the direction.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: well-built trailer
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has suspension on the wheels and wheel guards. I've had others and this one is super sturdy. We will decorate it and walk in the parade this winter. There are 2 side pockets and even bars in the back "trunk" to put the hitch when not in use, so that it doesn't get lost or rub a hole into the fabric. The instructions aren't written by an English-speaker, but we were able to assemble in about 40 minutes from trial and error. I also like the cushion for the child to sit on instead of a hammock-like fabric like the others have.
customer_reviews.author: Giantsgal4

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. Unwrapped the handle bar and it was ripped. I emailed the seller to notify them of the damage so i will update my review if i hear back from them. Other than that, seems like pretty good quailty. Directions were a little wonky but not impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Was easy to put together, has quick attachment to bike, has lights on back and another that can go on bike or front of trailer, offers a smooth ride for little ones, harnesses have a lot of adjustments. Just an over all good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RPlumb

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: After a hard time putting together this trailer I decided to look it up on YouTube and there was a very good video that I followed. When done I was Very happy with the product, I gave it 4stars because of the instruction manual was terrible. My children age 4 & 5 on the smaller size fit perfectly and there is room to grow!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: An happy son
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike trialer. My son loves it! There aren't many instructions about how you could assemble but it is not impossible! It is doing his job! Hapoy i will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Good but small

customer_reviews.title: Great double stroller for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this stroller. It's perfect for walks, runs or biking with my two toddlers. Two negatives, I wish it collapsed some and the break doesn't work well so you have to be careful where you let it rest. But other than that, I'd definitely recommend it. Has storage space in the back, adjustable handle is convenient, easy to change between bike and walk and fits in the back of my van easily. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ACD

customer_reviews.title: but we are having issues with the front jogging attachment not fitting and the front jogging wheel locks in a funny angle so it’s hard to push if you’re jogging
customer_reviews.text: Okay, but we are having issues with the front jogging attachment not fitting and the front jogging wheel locks in a funny angle so it’s hard to push if you’re jogging. I’ve contacted the seller about this so we’ll see. My little one loves riding in it behind the bicycle so it works for that well, just seems a bit more cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: It looks and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The trailer shipped quickly and was received in good condition. The assembly was pretty straightforward but only because it was mostly snapping parts together, the instruction manual was pretty limited and vague. At the end there were two parts left over that the manual didn't mention and weren't even listed in the parts glossary. Overall for the price and what I expected I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great combo
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 4 times and my 4.5 year old enjoys the size and ride. Very easy to install and wide enough for her to take toys and snacks. Nice firm place to put her feet as well. You only problem is she is a little tall for it with helmet on and netting strapped over top. I think we will make a slight modification so she is a little more comfy. All in all great trailer
customer_reviews.author: deanna

customer_reviews.title: Seems like an awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Seems like an awesome product, we havent tried two kids yet though seems a bit too narrow... we will see how they get along arm to arm! One reason I couldnt give it a 5 star rating was because the front wheel came defective making it impossible to stay loose— it keeps locking. Its my fault for not calling the company quick enough before the trial period for returns (it was a gift we just received on march 24, our baby shower) so it was purchased too long ago. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Covetskie

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: This is really roomy and we'll made. My kids def feel safe. Just if you need to transport it in an SUV, it's huge and you'll have to break it down which is not the easiest, but can be done.
customer_reviews.author: EBLAKE

customer_reviews.title: ... have given it 5 stars but the directions are horrible. They make no sense and the pictures are ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but the directions are horrible. They make no sense and the pictures are worthless. I finally figured it out, my kids love it and it looks good. Be ready to YouTube how to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Alex N

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Directions are the worst ever.
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled it works great. Assembly was all intuitive because the directions are little better than saying "Put it all together". No listing of anything other than main parts. We have small pieces left that are not shown anywhere in the directions. Hopefully they are not critical.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: Bike trailer
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Assembly was a breeze. My 15 month old is to small for the seatbealt that goes over the chest so i just use the on that goes over her lap and keep it slow.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller if you aren’t transporting.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to push. The ends don’t come with covers so they are very sharp. Every end is open pipe. It is very big, and you have to take the wheels off to fold. It is easy to fold but isn’t like a stroller and have to reassemble. It is very heavy. It’s great of you are running or biking from your home, but if you have to transport to use this trailer, it’s a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: Laina

customer_reviews.title: Great bike trailer!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this as a jogger but we take this traveling with us and hook it up to our bike. Our kids love it and it's easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: They LOVE IT! It was pretty easy to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter and granddaughter since she doesn't have a vehicle right now. They LOVE IT! It was pretty easy to put together and we love the versatility - both as a carrier and stroller. Plenty of storage room in the back and really easy to push and pull along - hardly any effort needed (at least on level ground). I got this carrier specifically because the front wheel will both swivel and stay locked but when it's in "swivel mode", it doesn't stay there . . . BUT it pushes very well with it locked so I wasn't too disappointed. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Walter H. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: the product and the quality are great plus they have an amazing customer service. The only thing it did not work good for me because its a little too big and my husband is disable and i could not fit it in the car and through the doors at home. But it is a great product and quality. eventhough i could not keep it for those reasons
customer_reviews.author: Czarina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent bike trailer.
customer_reviews.text: I've put about 75 miles on this so far. It seems to be pretty durable. It was simple to put together and does what it's supposed to do. My 2 year old can sleep in it pretty easily and the dual function stroller is a definite plus for my wife. I would buy it again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a really nice trailer, just had a few hiccups
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really nice trailer, just had a few hiccups. First the plastic on the bar assembly had holes that wouldn’t line up for the screws or pins, must have been drilled wrong on the assembly line. I had to make modifications in order to assemble it. Second the front tire is very cheap, the screw cannot tighten the wheel all the way down and is not aligned. It broke apart on the first ride, luckily you don’t need the front wheel when using a bike, but it Stowe’s on the back and just a few bumps it came apart. I definitely would NOT buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Newman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely horrible
customer_reviews.text: The maneuvering on this thing was HORRRIBLE!! The tires do not inflate all the way, I’ve had to take a bike pump with us to keep inflating the tires. The small one up front does NOT swivel like it’s supposed to. The damn thing does not turn easily at all. The worst buy I’ve had on Amazon. I will be returning. Do not waste your money buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old and his 6 year old friend fit in it no problem. It's been great getting exercise pulling him around. He can ride a bike with training wheels but I feel much safer just pulling him around the neighborhood while he plays on his tablet. Went together easy. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: wisteria_82

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this stroller! I only rated 4 stars on maneuverability because the front wheel lock sometimes rotates itself and you have to open it again. It was really easy to assemble and fold for on the go. Most bike trailers and double strollers like this cost over $300. This was an excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself seems nice and was relatively easy to assemble. However....one tire Hassan a busted inner tube so we purchased one at Walmart. Then we get home to fix that's and realize the front tire (stroller tire) has a bad valve... so disappointed. Brand new and can’t even use it as planned.
customer_reviews.author: Jo R

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna have to put 1 star across the board on the item because it looks in very good shape out of the box, everything was wrapped and packaged nicely and nothing seems damaged but there are no instructions on how to assemble. Not sure if it was a slip up on the manufacturer or what but it looks like it's going to be a bit of a pain with no instructions
customer_reviews.author: Cknuk

customer_reviews.title: We've really enjoyed this bike trailer
customer_reviews.text: We've really enjoyed this bike trailer. I like how the seat is a firm bench and not a canvas sling seat. We've had it for about a month and it's been great. It pulls well but is a little heavy - but then again, it's a two seater bike trailer. We weren't expecting it to be a feather. I haven't tried it as a jogging stroller yet, but I hope to.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hart

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for short rides around home
customer_reviews.text: The pros: price The cons: very poor quality straps that are difficult to adjust, and even at their tightest, not good for smaller children if they have a tendency to fall asleep in there. Handbreak doesn’t work at all. Height isnt tall enough for my 3 year old with a helmet on...have to leave the whole top open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good trailer for the money
customer_reviews.text: First of all I didn't want to spend a ton of money on an expensive trailer. In just a couple months I had to replace the tire treads because the ones they come with are very cheap and one of the the wheels is actually warped a bit so it wears funny. But it is a fantastic trailer for the price even with spending another $30 on the new treads. Easy to change from trailer to stroller and the hitch is nice and easy to attach.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Bizarre

customer_reviews.title: Horrible instructions!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the instructions are horrible & their website instructions weren’t much better. The box was also extremely damaged upon arrival, but the product seems ok. Will test out tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Camos

customer_reviews.title: Cannot replace wheels if they get damaged I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Waiting to hear back form Aosom in regards to replacement wheels. One came slightly bent and the other one our 3 year old stepped on after I removed to transport the trailer. Took both wheels to local bike shop they said they can't fix need to be replaced. So far customer service hasn't been able to help....so it's great as long as you never need to replace the wheels. DON'T BUY.
customer_reviews.author: michael waugh

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Easy to put together. Received with defected front tire and broken flashlight. There’s no way to fold this or set a break. You have to hold it in place while trying to buckle children.
customer_reviews.author: AFR

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for running and biking!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, qualities good. Was a pain to assemble because some of the parts were slightly bent. I assume it was lightly damaged during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have three children 5 and under. We have used this for out hiking on uneven trails and we have pulled it with a bike on roadways. It has worked great. There is just enough space for a medium sized bag to be stored under the kids. Only two of the kids can ride at once but when we're walking, one is usually out anyway. One downside is that it is large and takes up a lot of room. It folds down nice but still fills a lot of the storage area of a suburban. Probably not practical for smaller vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: I love this trailer but it has two issues with it
customer_reviews.text: I love this trailer but it has two issues with it. First, the wheel protection bars rub against both tires making them useless. I can not use the bars on my trailer. Second, to collapsing it is not as easy as I hoped. You have to remove the handlebars which don't detach completely and then collapse the sides. Even then it's still not compact enough to easily get through a doorway.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Tow arm is crooked.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are vague. You really won’t do anything wrong, but it made things difficult. The tow arm for the trailer has a suspension spring. Unfortunately, that spring comes at an angle. I could feel it pulling and it made unsettling jarring motions.
customer_reviews.author: Ross J. Patti

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but it is not as good as ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it is not as good as the one I had for my own children. There really isn't a way to use it until they are more of a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H

customer_reviews.title: If u are reading this, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: One of the Best things I bought this year. My son loves it, and we get to tour the neighborhood in style. Very clean and eye catching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: I only use it as a trailer, not a stroller. There are much nicer trailers out there, but for the price (I paid $88) this thing is surprisingly well built. It lacks some of the fancy features offered on expensive ones, but it is exactly what was advertised. I have no complaints over the quality of construction or durability. My kids love our rides and seem perfectly comfortable. We have not gone more than a couple miles at a time though. I may pick up some parts at the hardware store and upgrade the seat. It tends to sag a bit in the middle and the kids slide together.
customer_reviews.author: fluwoebers

customer_reviews.title: No customer service for missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It’s “ok” besides missing some parts for the front swivel wheel to make it a stroller. Mfg and seller have not responded for two weeks. Poor customer service... as there is “none”.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fun way to entertain my kids 2 & 4yrs while I workout and decided on a bike trailer. After reading reviews and comparing bike trailers for myself I decided on the Aosom Elite II. first because of the price and second because of the springs that work as shock absorbers. I couldn't be happier! My girls love going on rides and I like that I can easily turn the trailer into a stroller or a jogger. I am really happy with my purchase, but be warned that this is a BIG trailer! Delivery was fast and the assembly was a breeze. I would definitely recommend this trailer if you have the room.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Brakes DONT work
customer_reviews.text: I love it but the brakes do NOT work. Pros Bike trailer/ running stroller into one Spacious Easy to put together Easy to push Cons Brakes don’t work Bulky Doesn’t fold down to compact The “brake” cord dangles I had to zip tie it
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cart.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my two children: tall 5 year old and normal size 1.5 year old. The front tire tube wouldn't take air but customer service worked with me to make it right. I only use it for a stroller so can't speak to the performance as a trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P.

customer_reviews.title: My kids and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's just as described, easy enough to assemble, following the instructions of a youtube video, which was easy to find. It runs really well and my kids were comfortable in it, they love riding it and it's been very useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dany Gamarra

customer_reviews.title: It works great. It isn't the quickest thing to assemble and ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great. It isn't the quickest thing to assemble and disassemble. Bought it to use as a jogger as well but it doesn't fit through doorways. But as a camping stroller it's great. The straps are definitely a little spaced out but holds my 9 month old son. Pulls great behind the bike and does what it's suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: shawna

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in June and it is falling apart already. I have used the stroller function less than a dozen times and the bike trailer function only twice. No product should fall apart after a few uses. All the reflectors fell off after two uses, the break does not work, and the fabric in front that attaches the foot rest to the metal frame detached.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Where is the manual?!?
customer_reviews.text: Just opened, looks good, cant wait to get it set up.. only issue is... Where the hell is the manual?!?
customer_reviews.author: _.jzmn_

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lower cost but good quality bike trailer. Assembly was simple. I use it generally as a bike trailer, not as a stroller and it's been great. The suspension works will, The trailer connection is sturdy and convenient to connect and disconnect. There was one issue with the bike. The bike, brake pieces don't fit with the tires. That's a little bit obnoxious but the rest of the trailer makes up for it especially considering the price. All in all, I'd suggest this to anyone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The instruction Manual was virtually useless. And during the very first ride the front tire tore and nearly cause a crash with my children in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% satisfied with this product! I have 3 year old twins and I live on a gravel road and I was able to do push them by myself! The whole thing is easy to assemble and easy to store I have a chevy HHR and I don't have to break it down the whole way for it to fit! I am so happy I boaight this I didn't think I'd ever find a stroller that I could easily push on gravel and now I'm able to train for my 5k WITH my babies!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bike
customer_reviews.text: Someone in my family bought it so am not one who review it
customer_reviews.author: Wimpy Charley

customer_reviews.title: Needs pirate flag
customer_reviews.text: works great and rides well. I have to find a pirate flag instead of the safety flag. It is only missing one star because a 3 year old girl put her foot through the stitching on he front the first day... Otherwise... buy this thing if you want something that your kid is comfortable in and can have a friend ride along as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Pilo

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This trailer is what I expected it to be for the money. I wish it had better support under the seat and the brakes were actually effective but it works great to take my 5 and 2.5yo back and forth the school. Only real bummer is that the stroller attachment is difficult to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Anything for the grandkids...
customer_reviews.text: Rides smoothly. Steers great. Love the harnesses ( not just seat belts). Adjustable handle is awesome. Does not fold once it's assembled. Have to transport in the pickup. Will not fit in my 2015 Highlander assembled. Note - attaches to one side of bicycle rear tire. The bike can fall over with the trailer attached. I haven't had a trailer since my children were small. Purchased this to pull grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cole

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up! Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is what i was looking for. Easy set up, i did this while my kids were running around the living room & my husband was at work. Have not used it as a jogger yet. Also haven't collapsed it for storage either. Rides great, seatbelts could be better, but they work fine. Excited for the fun that's to be had.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Moore

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: This trailer does the job okay, although I mostly use it as a double stroller, not as bike trailer. I'm giving it 4 stars because a couple things could have been done better - the hand break has issues but is still usable, the seating isn't most convenient for the kids. We had to remove the side railings off the wheels in order for the trailer to fit through out doorway. Overall this is a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SMS Neighbors LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to figure out. But one you get it it's awesome! We're the envy of every mom at parks and the zoo! It's really easy to attach to my bike and pull, and is an awesome double stroller! Fits my 5 yo and 2 yo. Even carried my 8 yo niece the other day easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wetherell

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Well had some issues with the front tire does not swivel very well. was pretty easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B.

customer_reviews.title: A hole in my tire don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I got it and the tires it came with had a large hole in it . So now since everything is closed I can’t get a new Inertube
customer_reviews.author: Fernando ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really poorly written instructions. There are glaring typos, and you feel as though you were given extra parts.
customer_reviews.author: Cera Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great price. Ok quality. Collapses easily, rides well, keeps rain and bugs off the kids. Only con is the seat cousion slides out.
customer_reviews.author: Dandrew

customer_reviews.title: I feel like the product does have a smooth ride and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this is a common problem but I have to air the tires up every time I use it. They go flat after a day or two. The seat belts are a bit of a joke. They are not made to fit smaller children. I feel like the product does have a smooth ride and I like the functionality of the bike over all but the tires are so bad I don't know what to do. I wish the company would send new tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Fryman

customer_reviews.title: All Good So Far
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Putting it together wasn't hard, even with the somewhat opaque instructions. Seems to work well. Good functionality for the price, I suppose. Haven't used it for long or compared it to other products, so hard to say for sure, but I'm generally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey kesler

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: This is what we needed. My son is 4 and to big for the normal jogging stroller. This is just what the mama ordered :) Its big enough for him to lounge and play with toys. I was scared that it was going to be hard to put together myself but was super easy. The only thing that I dislike is the fact the small front tire came full of air but the larger ones didn't. But they are stable enough to hold use until we get ourselves to the gas station to fill air in them and then I will in turn by a hand pump for this kind of occasion again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I like that it comes with a flag and lights
customer_reviews.text: I went to go put it together so I can take my kids for a ride and the top bar is too long and the holes don't match up. It's the bar that holds the sides up and the seat up. I like that it comes with a flag and lights. I like the color. The bar is the only thing so far that was wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

product_meta.title: Aosom Elite 360 Swivel 2-in-1 Double Child Two-Wheel Bicycle Cargo Trailer and Jogger with 2 Safety Harnesses
feature_bullets: ✅SIMPLE AND CONVENIENT: Take your child jogging, biking, or walking conveniently and easily with this 2-in-1 jogging trailer.
✅2-IN-1 DESIGN: This can be used as a child stroller that you push as you run, or it can be attached to your bike for a cycling adventure.
✅SAFE AND SECURE: Includes a sling seat with a 5-point safety harness and removable canopy to help protect from sun, rain, or debris.
✅SPACIOUS AND OPEN: Seats 1-2 children or groceries and supplies, up to 88 lbs., making bike travel with cargo easy and convenient.
✅AMPLE STORAGE: A large storage space behind the seat is perfect for diaper bags, toys, beach gear, or groceries.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
